Four pillars of AI compliance

AIMS Studio covers the complete compliance lifecycle — from initial inventory to audit-ready documentation.

Inventory & Risk

Centralize every AI system and auto-classify risk under the EU AI Act (high / limited / minimal).

AI system inventory management
Automated risk classification
EU AI Act compliance mapping
Risk assessment workflows

Controls & Evidence

Map ISO 42001 controls, assign RACI owners, and link cryptographically sealed evidence (SHA-256). Export SoA as CSV.

ISO 42001 control mapping
RACI matrix assignment
SHA-256 evidence sealing
Statement of Applicability (SoA) export

FRIA & Incidents

Guided Article 27 FRIA wizard plus post-market monitoring for Article 72 incident tracking and KPIs.

Article 27 FRIA wizard
Post-market monitoring
Article 72 incident tracking
Compliance KPIs dashboard

Docs & Exports

Generate Annex IV, FRIA and SoA ZIPs with integrity headers — one click and audit-ready.

Annex IV generation
FRIA documentation
SoA reports
Audit-ready ZIP exports

Quick Actions

Security & Trust

Enterprise-grade security and compliance features built into every aspect of AIMS Studio.

Multi-tenant API-key security

Secure API access with tenant isolation and key-based authentication

Evidence SHA-256 checksums & audit trail

Cryptographically sealed evidence with immutable audit trails for compliance

Sanitized HTML previews (XSS-safe)

Secure document previews with XSS protection and content sanitization

Rate limiting per key

API rate limiting and throttling to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage

Docker + health/ready probes

Containerized deployment with health checks and readiness monitoring

Compliance & Certification

We prepare evidence; certification and audits remain with accredited bodies. AIMS Studio provides the tools and documentation needed for ISO 42001 certification, but the actual certification process is conducted by accredited certification bodies according to international standards.

SOC 2 Ready
GDPR Compliant
ISO 27001 Aligned
